headInformation.name: Oleksandr Dzisiak
headInformation.about: Front-End Developer (3+ years) specializing in building high-performance, responsive web applications with React, JavaScript and TypeScript. I am proficient in CSS, Tailwind CSS, UI component implementation, and the use of ready-made libraries. Headless CMS integration. Focused on delivering efficient, scalable, and detail-driven front-end solutions that improve UX and drive engagement.

petProjects.title: ERM System for VDG Solar
petProjects.description: Developed a custom ERM system for VDG Solar to manage electrical engineering operations. Features include Google Sheets integration, store management, cost calculation, and invoice generation. Initially a pet project, now under commercial development.
features: Database updates Google Sheets or Batch import

petProjects.title: TunerFest
petProjects.description: Developed TunerFest, a community website for The Crew MotorFest players in collaboration with Militia Gaming. Features PWA support, Sanity DB integration, fast search, and tuning tracking. From start it has more than 1000+ users. More than 32,000+ views. Median time on page 8:30 min. DB more than 5000+ records and unique pages. First load time 0.7 sec. GTmetrix A+. Seo text and image generation.

courses.platform: Piotr Tokarski President GREEN SMART ENERGY sp. k.

description: Developed and launched the corporate website using Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS 4.0, and Sanity CMS.
Integrated Sanity for dynamic content management across product pages, blog, and case studies.
Created calculation tools to enhance internal workflow efficiency.
Engineered a custom Enterprise Resource Management (ERM) system from the ground up.
Built intuitive and responsive user interfaces using Shadcn UI components, focusing on simplifying data entry and visualization.
Developed the company's multi-page website using React, focusing on presenting services and project information effectively.
Engineered a complex calculation tool, leveraging Google Sheets for data management, to streamline data processing.
Built a PDF generation tool to automatically create customized documents based on processed data and calculations.
Managed and enhanced the company's WordPress website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring optimal performance.
Identified and resolved front end bugs, and implemented new features to improve user experience and site functionality.
Monitored and analyzed website traffic using Google Analytics, providing insights into user behavior and site performance.

workExperience.companyName: BANKIER GROUP sp. z o.o. GREEN SMART ENERGY sp. k.
description: Installed and maintained solar power plants and residential electrical systems, repairing faults and rebuilding systems to ensure 99% operational uptime. Collaborated with team members to guarantee the proper functioning of all devices and equipment. Developed detailed monitoring procedures, enhancing device operation by 20%.
Developed and maintained multiple client WordPress websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Ensured cross-browser and cross-device compatibility through rigorous testing and debugging.
Implemented performance and SEO optimizations, resulting in Google PageSpeed scores exceeding more than 90 on all devices.
Started as IT Support and promoted to Department Manager due to high performance, developing skills in organization, personnel management, and meetings.

Organized documentation, managed office supplies, and optimized costs, setting new performance standards for the team. Delegated tasks efficiently, improving team productivity. Updated the company's website using Wix.com.
Developed and maintained the company's website using Wix.com, ensuring ease of updates for non-programmers. Managed content updates, added new features, and ensured efficient website operation.
Initiated and developed an advanced system for sorting, numbering, and tabulation, improving performance and reducing processing time by 30%, leading to a promotion.
Managed and delegated tasks to a team of 9, including account managers, storekeepers, couriers, and the repair department, ensuring efficient operations.

Optimized logistics for sending goods, reducing time and costs by 20%. Improved recruitment processes, reducing turnover by 15%. Enhanced team efficiency by addressing employee needs and solving problems effectively.
Offered the position of head of the regional department due to exceptional performance, demonstrating strong leadership and management skills.

workExperience.jobTitle: Employee of the desalination plant department
description: Monitored and maintained desalination plant hardware, ensuring optimal performance and reducing downtime by 15%.
Conducted water treatment processes, ensuring compliance with safety and quality standards.
Executed various operational tasks as per prescribed work instructions, contributing to overall plant efficiency.
Performed additional tasks under NDA, contributing to the secure and efficient operation of the desalination plant.
